page.title: 11BELMONT TODDLER GROUP.
page.content: One of the facilities for pre-school children in Belmont is the Toddler group.It was started five years ago by some mothers and a{health}visitor.The mothers take turns at having the children and the{mothers}at their houses.The number of{children}they have is 9-12.The age of the youngest child is eight months and the age of the oldest child is four years.Toddler Group starts at 10.a.m. and ends at 12 noon on Wednesdays.There is a subscription of 40p at each meeting.This provides a drink and a biscuit and a cup of tea or coffee for each mother.All the children seem to mix and they do not have any serious behaviour problems.Their{toys}include bricks,balls,pushbikes,jigsaws and teddy bears.
